name: Lucky Lefty Loves Landslides
description:
Lucky Lefty has a secret, they love to go fast! Lucky dreams of flying across the ground as if gravity has no constraint. Little does Lucky know that due to a mysterious and dangerous event, they are going to get to live their dream...

Controls

To Rotate in air: A/D or Left Arrow/Right Arrow

Jump: Space Bar or W or Up Arrow

Restart: R

Skip dialog: Space Bar or W or Up Arrow

This game was made in 2 days for Ludum Dare 49.

Original submit file is LuckyLeftyLovesLandslidesLD49.zip

HTML5 and LuckyLeftyLovesLandslidesLD49_bugfixes1.3.zip contains bugs fixes:

  • attempted performance fix by decreasing number of slime and duration of slime
  • fixed bug starting a 2nd game with the keyboard not clearing save data
  • local high score display fixed and turned back on
  • shortened title screen animation for those who would miss it
  • fixed full screen on html5
  • turned off debug output on html5
  • fixed high score text placement
